newsitem.title: USA: Custom Chrome renamed Global Motorsport.
newsitem.headline: Custom Chrome renamed Global Motorsport.

text.p: Custom Chrome Inc, a supplier of parts and accessories for Harley-Davidson motorcycles, on Friday said it was changing its corporate name to Global Motorsport Group Inc.
The company said the new name would more accurately reflect its overseas presence.

The company will retain Custom Chrome Inc as an operating company. Its stock symbol and Nasdaq exchange listing will not change, and senior management will assume their respective responsibilities at Global Motorsport Group Inc.
